00033         messageHandler->ClearTimer(neighbor->GetInactivityTimer());

00051         messageHandler->StartTimer(neighbor->GetInactivityTimer(), neighbor->GetRouterDeadInterval());

00054         if (!neighbor->NeedAdjacency()) {

00056             ChangeState(neighbor, new OSPF::NeighborStateTwoWay, this);
00057         }
00058     }

00066     }

00069         neighbor->StartUpdateRetransmissionTimer();
